testBuilder() - Method in class io.github.moctave.weftspace.UnitTests
This test takes data from the test node, builds it, and makes sure it's working properly.
testHumanReadableNodes() - Method in class io.github.moctave.weftspace.UnitTests
This test checks to make sure that nodes with extra empty lines in the middle of their definitions still parse properly.
testIO() - Method in class io.github.moctave.weftspace.UnitTests
This test creates a new DataNode, writes it to a file using DataWriter, reads it using DataReader, and compares it against the original node.
testNodeEquality() - Method in class io.github.moctave.weftspace.UnitTests
This test checks to make sure that identical data nodes are being treated as equal.
